mapper.insert: INSERT INTO code_analyses ( type_id, analysis_result, TYPE_CODE, development_style_score, collaboration_score, confidence_score ) VALUES ( #{typeId}, #{analysisResult}, #{typeCode}, #{developmentStyleScore}, #{collaborationScore}, #{confidenceScore} )
mapper.select: SELECT analysis_id AS analysisId, type_id AS typeId, analysis_result AS analysisResult, TYPE_CODE AS typeCode, development_style_score AS developmentStyleScore, collaboration_score AS collaborationScore, confidence_score AS confidenceScore, created_at AS createdAt FROM code_analyses WHERE type_id = #{typeId} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE code_analyses SET analysis_result = #{analysisResult}, TYPE_CODE = #{typeCode}, development_style_score = #{developmentStyleScore}, collaboration_score = #{collaborationScore}, confidence_score = #{confidenceScore} WHERE analysis_id = #{analysisId}
mapper.select: SELECT analysis_id AS analysisId, type_id AS typeId, analysis_result AS analysisResult, TYPE_CODE AS typeCode, development_style_score AS developmentStyleScore, collaboration_score AS collaborationScore, confidence_score AS confidenceScore, created_at AS createdAt FROM code_analyses WHERE type_id = #{typeId} ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT TYPE_CODE, COUNT(*) as count, AVG(development_style_score) as avg_development_style_score, AVG(collaboration_score) as avg_collaboration_score, AVG(confidence_score) as avg_confidence_score FROM code_analyses WHERE TYPE_CODE IS NOT NULL GROUP BY TYPE_CODE ORDER BY count DESC

SELECT ca.analysis_id, ca.type_id, ca.analysis_result, ca.TYPE_CODE, ca.development_style_score, ca.collaboration_score, ca.confidence_score, ca.created_at, dt.type_code as developer_type_code, dt.A_B점수, dt.R_I점수, dt.S_T점수, dt.D_F점수, dt.분석일시, dt.사용자ID FROM code_analyses ca LEFT JOIN `개발자 유형` dt ON ca.type_id = dt.type_id WHERE ca.type_id = #{typeId} ORDER BY ca.created_at DESC
SELECT TYPE_CODE, TYPE_NAME, TYPE_DESCRIPTION, TYPE_CHARACTERISTICS FROM developer_type_info ORDER BY TYPE_CODE
SELECT TYPE_CODE_1, TYPE_CODE_2, COMPATIBILITY_SCORE, COMPATIBILITY_DESCRIPTION FROM type_compatibility WHERE TYPE_CODE_1 = #{typeCode1} AND TYPE_CODE_2 = #{typeCode2}
